verses.name: Psalms 97:1
verses.text: The Lord reigneth; let the earth rejoice; let the multitude of isles be glad thereof.

verses.name: Psalms 97:2
verses.text: Clouds and darkness are round about him: righteousness and judgment are the habitation of his throne.

verses.name: Psalms 97:3
verses.text: A fire goeth before him, and burneth up his enemies round about.

verses.name: Psalms 97:4
verses.text: His lightnings enlightened the world: the earth saw, and trembled.

verses.name: Psalms 97:5
verses.text: The hills melted like wax at the presence of the Lord, at the presence of the Lord of the whole earth.

verses.name: Psalms 97:6
verses.text: The heavens declare his righteousness, and all the people see his glory.
